Title: Relates to requiring each county in this state to have at least one ambulance vehicle and emergency medical technicians trained to transport a person of 500 pounds or more
Summary: Relates to requiring each county in this state to have at least one ambulance vehicle and emergency medical technicians trained to transport a person of 500 pounds or more.
LawCode: Amd ยง122-b, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to requiring counties to have ambulance vehicle and emergency medical technicians trained to transport a person of five hundred pounds or more
